This article covers the installation and configuration of Arch Linux on a Framework Laptop 13 with a AMD Ryzen AI 300 Series mainboard.

For a general overview of laptop-related articles and recommendations, see Laptop.

sections.title: Installation
sections.content: It is highly recommended to use the latest stable kernel (linux) as linux-lts does not yet include patches for the Strix Point, Krackan Point APU and Zen 5 platform that improve stability, power efficiency and performance.
